fields.title: Event Choices
fields.description: List of possible events to send with conditions, weights, and targeting parameters.

fields.title: Min Activation Range
fields.description: Minimum distance from target to activate this event choice.

fields.title: Max Activation Range
fields.description: Maximum distance from target to activate this event choice.

fields.title: Cooldown Time
fields.description: Time in seconds before this choice can be used again.

fields.title: Cast Duration
fields.description: Time in seconds for the casting animation.

fields.title: Particle Color
fields.description: Color of particles during casting, in hex format like '#RRGGBBAA'.

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: Relative weight for random selection among event choices.

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that must be met for this event choice to be valid.

fields.title: Start Sound Event
fields.description: Sound event to play when casting starts.

fields.title: Sequence
fields.description: List of events to send in order with timing.

fields.title: Base Delay
fields.description: Delay in seconds before this step executes.

fields.title: Event
fields.description: Event to send to the target entity.

fields.title: Sound Event
fields.description: Sound event to play when this step executes.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Send Event Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to send an event to another mob.

fields.title: Cast Duration
fields.description: Time in seconds for the entire event sending process

fields.title: Look At Target
fields.description: If true, the mob will face the entity it sends an event to

fields.title: Sequence
fields.description: List of events to send

fields.title: Base Delay
fields.description: Amount of time in seconds before starting this step

fields.title: Event
fields.description: The event to send to the entity

fields.title: Sound Event
fields.description: The sound event to play when this step happens

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
